value.title: Get started with Machine Learning with an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
value.excerpt: Azure includes a pre-configured virtual machine service for performing Data Science tasks. Learn how to use the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine to do common data analysis and machine learning tasks.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides some pre-configured virtual machine images specifically designed for data science.  Learn how you can use these to get a jump start on your data science work.

images.title: Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

topItems.title: Explore the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You learn about the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines (DSVM) and when to use each type.  You will learn about the Windows-based and Linux-based DSVMs which each support different needs.

images.title: Explore the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines

topItems.title: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
topItems.excerpt: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

images.title: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

value.title: Implement knowledge mining with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Do you have information locked up in structured and unstructured data sources?  Using Azure Cognitive Search, you can extract key insights from this data, and enable applications to search and analyze them.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cognitive Search solution
topItems.excerpt: Unlock the hidden insights in your data with Azure Cognitive Search.

topItems.title: Create an enrichment pipeline with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Use the power of artificial intelligence to enrich your data and find new insights.

topItems.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.

value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure App Service

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: Provision and manage Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about Cognitive Services and the important role they play in developing AI infused applications.  This learning path will introduce you to creating, managing, and deploying Cognitive Services in the Azure portal or through containers.

topItems.title: Create and manage Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Azure Cognitive Services enable developers to easily add cognitive features into their applications. Learn how to configure and manage these services for your AI application needs.

topItems.title: Investigate container for use with Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Container support in Cognitive Services allowing the use of APIs available in Azure and enable flexibility in where to deploy and host the services with Docker containers.

topItems.title: Secure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to secure Cognitive Services to prevent data loss and privacy violations for user data that may be a part of the solution.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Administer and manage Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine remotely
value.excerpt: You’ll be able to select and use suitable tools and techniques to remotely manage Windows IaaS VMs, and restrict administrative connections to those VMs.

value.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

value.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

value.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Author Azure Resource Manager templates from scratch
value.excerpt: Learn to write Resource Manager templates enabling you to deploy your infrastructure and solutions faster and more reliably.

value.title: Automate the configuration of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: You'll be able to deploy Desired State Configuration (DSC) extensions, implement those extensions to remediate noncompliant servers, and use custom script extension.

value.title: Automate the installation and configuration of software in your Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to automate the installation and configuration of software in your Azure Virtual Machines.

value.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services that help developers and operations engineers use build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

value.title: Diagnose startup errors in your application using Kudu console
value.excerpt: This module explains how to use kudu console to examine the application event log to identify the event that caused the error.

value.title: Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources
value.excerpt: Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

value.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) and how they can impact your application design decisions. Also see how to access preview services and learn how they impact your planning.

value.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organization’s cloud adoption efforts

value.title: Choose the best Azure landing zone to support your cloud operations requirements
value.excerpt: Azure landing zones help accelerate configuration of your environment to meet your operational requirements.

value.title: Configure BitLocker disk encryption for Windows IaaS Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: You'll be able to configure Azure Disk Encryption for Windows IaaS VMs and back up and recover encrypted data.

value.title: Transcribe speech in real time with Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to transcribe speech and convert it to text through real-time transcription with the Speech Service in Azure Cognitive Services.

images.title: Transcribe speech in real time with Azure Cognitive Services
Transcribe speech in real time with Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Build a Java app for Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a Java application to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Create an Azure Cognitive Search solution
value.excerpt: Unlock the hidden insights in your data with Azure Cognitive Search.

value.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
value.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Create an enrichment pipeline with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Use the power of artificial intelligence to enrich your data and find new insights.

value.title: Create and implement application allowlists with adaptive application control
value.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Adaptive application controls within your organization to protect your Windows Server IaaS VMs.

value.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.
